language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: to count, to calculate, to enumerate, to spell, to read

This is a counting term for any numeral that is not a multiple of 10.  For example twenty is [rua rongo'uru]; 22 is [rua rongo'uru e rua tou'ara]. Not exactly 'to count', but the closest to a counting-type term in the language.
Enumerate, count, go through items on a list (Fth)
WP: makira L: yepa-na, reke-na VL, VLP: kira
